content: I can't recommend specific market research partners. however, there are many market research firms and agencies that offer a range of services at different price points. some of them offer affordable options, especially for small businesses and startups. it's important to do your research and find a partner that has experience in your industry and can provide the services you need within your budget. additionally, you can also consider using online survey tools such as surveymonkey and google forms, which can be a more cost-effective way to collect primary data.
